name: tinsel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
long pieces of thin, shiny material used as decoration, especially at Christmas: a Christmas tree decorated with tinsel
Andy Crawford/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
disapproving something, especially the entertainment business or someone's way of living, that seems exciting and attractive, but is really of low quality or value: The show was all tinsel and glitter.
